name: test_e2e_with_logs[528_HPP_DEBUG_002]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `HPP_DEBUG_002` |
| **Name** | Privilege write access via HPP |
| **Category** | HPP |
| **Subcategory** | privilege_escalation |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `&privilege=write&access=admin`
- **Encoded**: `%26privilege%3Dwrite%26access%3Dadmin`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~28000ms
- **Timestamp**: 11:11:31.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX HPP] HTTP Parameter Pollution attempt detected` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX HPP] HTTP Parameter Pollution attempt detected test_id=HPP_DEBUG_002-1772277091413-wsd4n pattern_id=HPP_DEBUG_002 uri=/?q=%26privilege%3Dwrite%26access%3Dadmin client=127.0.0.1` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence
